ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ pounds banana peppers, cut into 1 inch pieces
1 pound jalapeno peppers, cut into 1 inch pieces
¼ pound serrano peppers, cut into 1 inch pieces

cookingTips: Wear gloves when cutting hot peppers to prevent capsaicin oils from burning your skin and eyes
Mix varieties of peppers to create a range of heat levels in the finished product
Pack peppers and aromatics in jars before pouring hot brine to maintain color and texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How will you manage the different heat levels of three pepper varieties, and what safety precautions are essential when handling hot peppers?
